patterns_discovered: User-scoped webhook design with user_id filtering
Async webhook delivery with retry logic
HMAC-SHA256 signature generation for webhook security
Fire-and-forget webhook trigger pattern using asyncio.create_task()
Comprehensive logging of webhook delivery attempts
gotchas_discovered: Cost monitoring service runs independently, lacks user context
Cost optimizer has its own webhook mechanism
Global cost thresholds not aligned with user-specific webhook integration

approach_outcome.description: Investigate webhook trigger for cost threshold alerts
approach_outcome.result: No implementation needed - cost monitoring service incompatible with user-scoped webhook design

recommendations: Create a user-specific cost alerting service in future to leverage webhook integration
Maintain cost.threshold event type in valid events list for potential future use
Consider adding user context to global infrastructure services
